member.name: CROSS_SLIDE_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies the state of the cross-slide interaction.

member.name: CROSS_SLIDE_FLAGS.CROSS_SLIDE_FLAGS_SELECT
member.summary: Cross-slide interaction has crossed a distance threshold and is in select mode.

member.name: CROSS_SLIDE_FLAGS.CROSS_SLIDE_FLAGS_SPEED_BUMP
member.summary: Cross-slide interaction is in speed bump mode.

member.name: CROSS_SLIDE_FLAGS.CROSS_SLIDE_FLAGS_REARRANGE
member.summary: Cross-slide interaction has crossed the speed bump threshold and is in rearrange (drag and drop) mode.
